verses.roman:
e-vatsara tāṅhā āmi yāimu āpane
tāhāi milimu saba advaitādi sane

synonyms: e-vatsara—this year; tāṅhā—there (to Bengal); āmi—I; yāimu—shall go; āpane—personally; tāhāi—there; milimu—I shall meet; saba—all; advaita-ādi—beginning with Advaita Ācārya; sane—with.
translation: "This year I shall personally go to Bengal and meet all the devotees there, headed by Advaita Ācārya.
